Articles.Content:
Hi guys, I just wanna show my newly built space station(my first one) around Kerbin, It's composed of around 500 parts and It is very big! it can support 63 crews (9 kerbals currently on station)

here is the full construction album (19 pictures) http://imgur.com/a/jkdye

I did not use any hyperedit or orbital construction in this.

here the solar panels are perpendicular to the modules

here the solar panels are parallel to the modules

Edited May 13, 2013 by lyndonguitar

Very nice! I take it power can go through the servos? Also there's a couple of habitat modules I don't recognize. I recognize the FusTec parts but not the others. Also, how much luck do you have with that station arm? Any time I try to so much as pull a module out of my shuttle, the arm promptly uses it to beat me to a fiery death. Again, great job!

500 parts?!! My computer is going to die with that much parts.

Good job building it.
